botan.selftest.selftest

Startup Self Test

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

void confirmStartupSelfTests(AlgorithmFactory af);
Run a set of self tests on some basic algorithms like AES and SHA-1

Params:
AlgorithmFactory af an algorithm factory

Throws:
if a failure occured

bool passesSelfTests(AlgorithmFactory af);
Run a set of self tests on some basic algorithms like AES and SHA-1

Params:
AlgorithmFactory af an algorithm factory

Returns:
s false if a failure occured, otherwise true

HashMapRef!(string, bool) algorithmKat(in SCANToken algo_name, in HashMapRef!(string, string) vars, AlgorithmFactory af);
Run a set of algorithm KATs (known answer tests)

Params:
SCANToken algo_name the algorithm we are testing
HashMapRef!(string, string) vars a set of input variables for this test, all hex encoded. Keys used: "input", "output", "key", and "iv"
AlgorithmFactory af an algorithm factory

Returns:
map from provider name to test result for that provider

HashMapRef!(string, string) algorithmKatDetailed(in SCANToken algo_name, ref const HashMapRef!(string, string) vars, AlgorithmFactory af);
Run a set of algorithm KATs (known answer tests)

Params:
SCANToken algo_name the algorithm we are testing
HashMapRef!(string, string) vars a set of input variables for this test, all hex encoded. Keys used: "input", "output", "key", and "iv"
AlgorithmFactory af an algorithm factory

Returns:
s map from provider name to test result for that provider
